title: AgentConfiguration
description: The full configuration of an agent.

HalGuru.description: The header metadata used in the hal.guru agentic process automation platform.

PlatformVersion.title: Platform Version
PlatformVersion.description: The version of the hal.guru platform in use.

PlatformUrl.title: Platform URL
PlatformUrl.description: The URL of the hal.guru platform.

AutogeneratedAgentUrl.title: Autogenerated Agent URL
AutogeneratedAgentUrl.description: The autogenerated URL for this agent.

Id.title: Agent ID
Id.description: The unique identifier for the agent (GUID ex. 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012).

Type.title: Type of the Agent
Type.description: Represents a basic agent type within the system. This type is generally used for the default or simplest form of agent functionality.

Author.title: Author of the Agent
Author.description: Represents an author entity with metadata about an individual or organization.

Email.title: Contact Email
Email.description: The email address of the author.

Url.title: URL
Url.description: The URL associated with the author.

Company.title: Company
Company.description: The company associated with the author.

Copyright.title: Copyright
Copyright.description: The copyright information associated with the author or their works.

Start.title: Agent Start Configuration
Start.description:
Represents the start configuration for a robot.
This class defines the initial setup or parameters required when the robot is initiated.

LlmConnectorName.title: LLM Connector Name
LlmConnectorName.description: Name of the LLM connector to be used from the LlmConnectors list.

PromptName.description: Name of the prompt to be used during the agent's initialization process.

Url.description: URL associated with the start configuration of the agent.

Themes.title: Agent Themes
Themes.description: The collection of themes and their associated designs for the agent.

items.description:
Represents a design configuration for a specific theme,
which may include settings related to chat appearance or other customizable elements.

Theme.title: Theme
Theme.description:
Represents the theme options available for a robot's display or functionality settings.
Provides a selection of predefined appearance modes, designed to meet various
user preferences and environment requirements.

Messages.title: Messages (Theme Design)
Messages.description: Chat message themes associated with the theme design.

items.description:
Represents the visual theme for a chat message, including settings for icon appearance
and text or background colors. This class defines customization properties that control
the overall design of individual chat messages.

MessageType.title: Message Type
MessageType.description:
Represents the type of a chat message in the system.
Used to categorize messages based on their source or purpose.

IconCssClass.title: Icon CSS Class
IconCssClass.description: The CSS class for the icon displayed in the user interface.

IconColor.title: Icon Color
IconColor.description: The color for the icon displayed in the user interface.

IconUrl.title: Icon URL
IconUrl.description: The URL for the icon displayed in the user interface.

BackgroundColor.title: Background Color
BackgroundColor.description: The background color for the user interface.

TextColor.title: Text Color
TextColor.description: The text color displayed in the user interface.

UserInterface.title: Agent User Interface
UserInterface.description: Represents the design configuration for an agent's user interface.

DisableCloseButton.title: Disable Close Button
DisableCloseButton.description: Indicates whether the close button should be disabled.

Features.title: Agent Features
Features.description:
Represents the behavior settings for an agent. This class defines the configurable
properties that determine how an agent operates during its execution.

CheckAllUrls.title: Check all URLs
CheckAllUrls.description: Determines whether all URLs exist and are valid in the generated answer.

CheckIsAnswerCorrect.title: Check answer
CheckIsAnswerCorrect.description: Determines whether the answer provided is evaluated as correct.

CheckIsLastUrlCorrectAnswer.title: Check last URL
CheckIsLastUrlCorrectAnswer.description: Determines whether the last URL in the provided collection is the correct answer.

CommentCurrentUrl.title: Comment current URL
CommentCurrentUrl.description: Determines whether the robot should comment the current URL.

PerChannelThreading.title: Per channel threading
PerChannelThreading.description: Determines whether a separate thread is created for each channel.

MaxRetryAttempts.title: Retry on failure
MaxRetryAttempts.description: Determines whether the robot should retry the check fails.

Messages.description: Static messages used for quick access within the system.

items.description: Represents a static message associated with an agent.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of the static message for the agent.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Content of the static message for the agent.

Prompts.description: Prompts available within the agent's configuration.

items.description: Represents a prompt model with properties for displaying a name and associated text.

Prompt.description: The text content of the prompt.

items.description: Represents a configuration object for connecting to a Large Language Model (LLM) provider.

Name.description: Represents the name assigned to the LLM Connector configuration.

LlmProvider.description: Represents an enum value for the DeepSeek provider in the LlmProvider enumeration.

Model.description: Specifies the model identifier to use within the LLM Connector instance.

Temperature.description:
Specifies the randomness of responses generated by the language model,
with lower values resulting in less random outputs and higher
values increasing creativity and variability.

MaxTokens.description: Specifies the maximum number of tokens the model will generate in its response.

AssistantId.description: Identifies the specific assistant model or instance used within the LLM connection.

VectorStoreId.description: Identifier for the associated vector store.

ApiKey.description: Represents the API key used to authenticate with the LLM provider.

InstructionsPrompt.description: Specifies the custom instructions or contextual guidance provided to the LLM for tailoring its responses.

Tools.description: Represents a collection of tools or additional functionalities associated with the LLM connection.

ApiUrl.description: Represents the base URL of the API used to connect to the Large Language Model (LLM) provider.

Secrets.description: Key-value pairs used to store sensitive information.

Key.title: Secret Key
Key.description: The name of the secret key.

Secret.title: Secret Value
Secret.description: The value of the secret key.

oneOf.description: Defines the operational state and associated metadata for a session of an agent.

Started.title: Started
Started.description: The moment when the agent AI is initiated.

IsStarted.title: Is Started
IsStarted.description: Indicates whether the agent has been started.

ThreadId.title: Thread Id
ThreadId.description: The identifier of the thread associated with the agent.

LlmConnectorName.title: LLM Connector Name
LlmConnectorName.description: The name of the LLM connector associated with the agent.

PromptName.title: Prompt Name
PromptName.description: The name of the currently active prompt associated with the agent.

Url.title: Url
Url.description: The URL associated with the agent session.

Language.title: Language
Language.description: The language associated with the agent session.

Description.description: A brief description or details regarding the agent session.

Variables.description: Represents a collection of variables associated with the agent session.

Tests.description: Test cases for validating the behavior of an agent.

items.description: Represents a test case for validating an agent's response to a given input.

Name.title: Test Name
Name.description: The name of the test case.

QuestionMessage.title: Question Message
QuestionMessage.description: The question or input message directed to the agent.

AnswerMessageContains.title: Answer Message Contains
AnswerMessageContains.description: A list of substrings that the output message is expected to contain.

AnswerMessageRegex.title: Answer Message Regex
AnswerMessageRegex.description: A regular expression pattern that the agent's response should conform to.
